functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Receive ETH from player and update his balance on DiceContract.

functionDecorators.name: emergencyWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: EmergencyWithdraw when need to update contract.

functionDecorators.name: governance
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: playDiceGame
functionDecorators.description: Play Dice Game, only Owner can call this function.

functionDecorators.name: playTournamentDiceGame
functionDecorators.description: Play Tournament Dice Game, only Owner can call this function.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyGovernance` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawFee
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw Fee ETH to fee account, only Owner can call this function.
